content.detailedDescription: Not a ufo but black unmarked blackhawk helicopters.  clear and sunny afternoon.  all of a sudden i heard and then saw the 4 choppers in very tight formation zooming just above rooftop level.  they came out of the northwest heading southeasterly.  there was no sound off in the distance like you would normally hear with an approaching aircraft.  i heard/saw them only as they approached over the house across the street from mine.  very rare to see something like this.  air ambulance infrequently flies in to the hospital here but military (let alone black unmarked) helicopters are extremely rare.
content.summary: 4 black helicopters at rooftop level in tight formation.

content.detailedDescription: Standing on my back deck on a mild, absolutely clear august night i witnessed a bright neon green light flash in the southwest sky.  it had the shape of a hot dog or long balloon, the type used for making figures.  it acted like a falling star in motion although the color was stunning.  a shade of green so unique and beautiful. i've never seen anything like it before or since.  the distance made it too difficult to discern whether it was an actual object or an event caused by an object.  a few days later the quad city media were reporting crop circles that were discovered in a cornfield near coal valley.  i have seen comets and falling stars and know that this was different.  this did not burn out like the usual falling stars do.
content.summary: Clear night. bright neon green light in southwest sky.  shape of a hot dog or long balloon in the southwest sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was approx 9:00 am. we walked out into our backyard and looked up into the sky.  we saw a white horseshoe shaped or u-shaped object flying over our house, heading west, then we saw a couple of barbell shaped objects, also heading west.  the colors were red on one end, white on the other end and blue in the middle.  these objects flew vertically, not horizontally.  there was a jet flying over at the same time which was actually lower than the object, therefore showing us how high and large the object had to have been.  there was never any sound nor contrail from any of the objects.  we then saw teardrop shaped object, very bright on one end, and several disc shaped objects which were extremely bright and surrounded by a brightness or shimmering.  keeping in mind, we are half a mile from the los angeles airport and 2 miles from the hawthorne airport, so we are familiar with the normal flight patterns in our area.  none of these objects flew within the regular flight patterns.  they flew northwest or southwest.  all of them flew in various directions, but eventually headed west.  this was the most exhilirating experience myself, my wife and son have ever experienced.
content.summary: Saw several ufo's flying over our house, over an hour and a half, heading west

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on stephanie st. crossing w. horizon ridge parkway in henderson, nv when i noticed two extremely bright objects just above the horizon and north by northwest of my location, which made them almost due north of north las vegas. from this vantange point i could see accross the entire las vegas valley. the objects were approximately the same size, shape (irregular circle), brightness, and color (a very warm orange) and were much bigger and brighter than any airplane landing or helicopter search lights. the objects moved together in synchronization and only in the vertical direction (apparent). one object seeming to be slightly closer and higher than the other. when the objects suddenly disappeared, i realized that they were quite far away, at least 18-20 miles, because they had dropped down behind a high mountain ridge (name unknown) just north of las vegas near the eastern edge of the nellis air force range. the lights moved vertically up and down a total of three times (observed) and then failed to rise again after their final disappearance behind the mountain range. brightness did not vary during their successive rise and fall behind the mountain and there was no apparent lateral movement. from my location, it seem to have taken about 10 seconds for the lights to rise to their maximum height, appearing one after the other, where they paused together for perhaps 20 seconds before descending again. two additional people riding with me, one adult and one child, also witnessed the event. the weather was completely clear with no clouds in sight, but there was a slight haze at the horizon.

i frequently watch the air traffic over las vegas in the evenings during walks and drives. my location on a hill in henderson makes for excellent viewing.  when i noticed the two lights i immediately identified them as not matching anything i normally see in the skys around las vegas.
content.summary: Two large glowing objects move vertically north of las vegas

content.detailedDescription:
I had just left work and was driveing my car in the west parking lot of the atlantis casino. i drove thru the parking lot and onto virginia steet going north bound. when i turned i noticed a set of bright lights coming south bound just to the west of virginia street and about 300 or 400 hundred feet in the air.There were about 15 or 20 individual bright lights making up a v formation.The lights appeared to be about the size of marbles. my first thought was a flock of geese that were being ilmuninated. i thought about what i was seeing and was trying to procces it, when i realized i needed to park my car and observe what i seeing. i turned east bound onto mona st and made a right hand turn into a parking lot and parked. i got out of my car just in time to see them pass over my head and to the west. the thing that made me shakie was when i realized their was no noise coming from these lights. they made a slow turn to the west and faded away.
as i contiuned my drive home, i searched the radio stations thinking there would be news reports of what i had just seen, but there were none.
the next afternoon at work i quered people i worked with and who had gotten off work the same time as i had about seeing the lights. nobody i have talked with saw anything. i know what i saw, and it makes no sense that no one else saw these lights. is it possible to see what no one else sees???
content.summary: 15 to 20 indivdual  lights, in formation moving slowly and making no sound

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture today 11/20/2006 at 8:40am from my front yard. the zoom on the camera was about 1x15. the objects were over extreme eastern north carolina.Numbers 1 and 5 are enhanced.
content.summary: Five objects in eastern north carolina sky

content.detailedDescription:
We were having a bond fire that friday, and witnessed some strange actvitity. prior to the events, the sky had been relatively clear, with normal stars and airplane activity. around midnight we witness a huge blue flash in the sky that lit up the entire sky for a split second. (i was turned the complete other way, but noticed the entire sky in my peripheral illuminate blue). my friends who actually saw this light said it was an extremely large blue ball that flashed and illuminated the whole sky. after the flash we witness three other lights in the sky. i actually saw two of these lights. they were very high and very large, with tails, these were much brigther than meteors although they were not blue. at first i thought they were just meteors, but they were moving entirely too slow and were entirely to large to be meteors. also these lights were not falling but moving in a straight linear pattern. these lights only appeared for several seconds a piece. after we witnessed these lights, we noticed a huge surge in air activity, mostly helicopters but there were some airplanes flying low that we could tell were not commercial jets. mount weather is located close to where these lights were spotted, and we noticed all of the elevated air activity traveling to or from the direction of mount weather. at first i wasnt going to report this, because lights cannot confirm anything, but i've been thinking why there might be such elevated air activity from one of our nations most secretive military bases.

i wish i caught this on tape, but they all happened unexpectedly for short amounts of time. 

i am really interested in ufos, extraterrestrials, and other things involving the subject. feel free to email me at bwcastro22@aol.Com
content.summary: Strange blue lights seen above northern virginia

content.detailedDescription:
I was stopped at the intersection of red creek road and menge avenue on my way home from picking up my new car. i was turning south onto menge from red creek. i was on my cell phone with my younger sister when i saw the lights above the trees coming straight in  my direction. they were low, or so i thought. at first i was frightened due to the level it was flying. i thought it was a large airplane headed to the gulfport/biloxi regional airport, but it turned in the same direction that i was turning. it made at least 3 or 4 turns from east to west as i observed it on my way home. it seemed to be in some type of holding pattern. i saw it twice as i traveled west on hwy 90 (the beach boulevard), and it seemed to follow the beach until it turned and then returned slightly to the north. i stopped at the winn dixie shopping center and parked to see if i could hear it if it came again and it did; all the while i was describing what was happening to my sister. i never heard any sound assoicated with it(i reasoned that the traffic from the highway might be why i couldn't hear anything)nor could i make out the shape from the underside. it almost appeared to be a string of lights only. it moved slowly, too slowly i thought for an aircraft that would have that wide of a wingspan. when i could no longer see it (as it was again headed west) i turned up the street on the west side of the shopping center to go home. as i neared the railroad track (which is elevated)it was coming again from the west. i stopped my car, got out and tried to make out the size and shape as it flew directly over me. all i could see was one small flashing white light and stars; and all i could hear was the distance sound of a small airplane which really confused me! i thought i should be hearing some heavy engine noise as close as it was. it appeared to be only 50 feet above the tree tops. i felt a bit frightened by the contradiction of what i was seeing and hearing. my sister and i laughed about it, but it was a rather nervous laugh on my part.I returned home and fell asleep almost immediately. i work a graveyard at the a hospital and i usually take a nap before going in. i lived by myself, so there was no one to tell once i got home. 

since this experience i have been trying to find aircraft that fit this same description. i've sat in a parking lot that's in the path of the landing strip at the gulfport/biloxi regional airport and i have not seen anything like it. the noise aircraft make when landing is enormous and they have lights of varying sizes. the lights aren't spaced evenly either. the lights on the craft i saw were all white and spaced just like a tennis bracelet - perfectly even and there was no sound. perhaps it's a known craft, but to me it is still unidentified.
content.summary: Lights in a tennis bracelet semi-circle - flying low above tree tops

content.detailedDescription: Shot up into the sky at incredible speed.Authorities reported sighting to news orginizations and the military. local airport did not see it on radar.Don't know if an investigation was ever pursued.                             i would like to know if you have any record of occurence.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo was sighted and followed along county roadway by 2 town police, a state trooper, and civilians in thier vehicles for about 7 miles. cigar shaped object was slowly moving just above treeline. it stopped and hovered for several minutes and

content.detailedDescription: I was driving a semi on warnerville road near oakdale california when i noticed weird lights in the sky hovering in a cow pasture. all i know it wasn't a plane, it wasn't a helicopter, but it was a circular craft with lights on hovering about 50-100 feet off the ground. it was a couple weeks back. i stopped my rig and watched it just drift silently away into the night no noise whatsoever. i wasn't scared at all but more fascinated than anything else. it just seem to drift off into the distance and disappear. when i stopped i put my spotlight on it and was waiting for a reaction. but it didn't pay me no mind and just drifted off into the night.
content.summary: Wierd circular craft in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Now it is sunday, as always i have fascination by the not identified flying objects. they were like that of the 10 in the morning when i saw. first, it seemed like a cloud, of that they leave the jet-powered airplanes.
first moved in horizontal form downwards and later a turn occurred suddenly towards the south.
two hours later i saw the other first it descries a figure in the sky with the binoculars and was a pair of tied globes of red and yellow color, i felt disappointed so lets see it by awhile,
next to globes i saw suddenly. a shining object asks to me  what is that?  so i takes hold the binoculars and i put myself to investigate, my suspicions were certain, it was an identified object that did not investigate globes giving him several returns, 
and when seeing i think that he was not dangerous he leave.

later i get the worker from my husband to take painting samples for the house and while ,converse, a star flights i penetrate in the atmosphere passage over our heads of course, to certain height and coat a great flame and i am listened to a sound and he dissolved, gave the impression that he had fallen to single two blocks of my house.

to 6 p.M.
they were three lights that moved with a great distance one of the other but without losing distance one of other it gave the impression me that it was a gigantic ship that was invisible and single their lights noticed, three of red color.  that they moved of north to the south, without losing the alignment.
it was a full day of activity.  thanks and im sorry by my bad writing in english
content.summary: Not identified flying object

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way back from kirby, and noticed a black flying triangle that was flying toward sheridan, wyoming leaving a large lake area.  it was moving at a slow rate of velocity for a flying aircraft.  40 miles per hour at a guess.  i watch for almost three minutes until the object disappeared over the horizon of a hill slopping east and west, with about a 60 degree incline, and about .2 miles up hill.
content.summary: I noticed a black flying triangle near decker wyoming

content.detailedDescription:
I have a two-page well-written letter by mrs. isbell at the time. where do i send it to you? the observer was lucille k. isbell and two other ladies. i knew her well and talked to her the next day. i sincerely believe every word she wrote. she was really shook. 
     also, i personally saw a probable contact with aliens in the early 30's south of san francisco. the sheriff, a cattle rancher, and several witnesses were there. i have a written report on that.

     please e-mail me with your mailing address.
content.summary: I will send a very good description by u.S. mail when i get your address.

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:00 pm i was at the window on east side of my house facing towards the mesa verde national park when i noticed red and blue lights flashing in the sky. i went outside to get a better look. i noticed the lights were not moving. i thought they may be a satellite or the space station. i thought it was odd that they were not moving.

i called a science teacher i knew from school and she too had no idea what the lights were. we had visited on the phone and watched the lights together. i then called our local police dispatch and they gave me a number to call who maybe could answer my question of what was in the sky.

what i saw was this: red, blue, white and some green lights remaining steady in the air at about a 50 degree angle over mesa verde national park. while i could see airplane lights in the back ground of the sky the lights remained in the same position of the sky. the lights were much bigger then airplanes in this area. the two lights came closer together then they appeared to look more white but when looking through binoculars the colors red and blue were still appearent.Colors remained very brillant at all times. never changing or getting dull. always very clear and bright.

i watched the stars in the sky. you could tell that they were moving with the rotation but the red and blue lights remained steady and held at their location. i sat in my kitchen window for a period of time then at mid-night the lights were gone. had not rotated or moved, but just gone.
content.summary: 2 seperate lights flashing red, blue and white. sometimes a green in between.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness was interviewed by phone and recounted the following:

witness was in the marine corp (rank of lance corporal), in 1977, stationed on the big island of hawaii at an army post between mauna loa and mauna kea volcanoes. the marines were providing base security. four marines (friends of the witness) reported that they were almost abducted while guarding the motor pool. the four were sitting in the back of an open 2 1/2 ton truck, when they saw a light in the distance. the light was amber colored so they used a flashlight with a colored lens to signal the object. the ufo turned a different color and the marines changed the flashlight lens to match and signaled the ufo again. the ufo then moved to their location, hovered above the truck, and then shot down a beam of light which began pulling the four marines to it. the four linked arms with the marine at the bottom holding on to the truck. the ufo let go.

4 days after this attempted abduction, witness was himself walking his guard duty post at the motor pool. it became eerily quiet. the witness looked up to see a giant saucer shaped craft directly above his head. he could see right underneath it - was about 1000 feet across and was metallic. the center of the craft was lighter in color then the periphery (about 100 feet center diameter). witness became scared and ran into the duty shack where his sergeant reprimanded him for abandoning his post. witness told sergeant about the ufo and both went outside to observer it, but the craft was gone. no sound was heard during the event. witness discussed his sighting with the marines who had the experience 4 days earlier but they did not report it up the military chain of command.
content.summary: While on guard duty at an army base saw a large saucer hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Witness was interviewed by phone and recounted the following"
in the fall of 1973, multiple witnesses saw a orange sphere, 1000 feet in diameter, with plasma, burning flames emanating, above the hidalgo mountains, south of lordsburg, new mexico. witness' sister was driving out of town headed west when she saw cars pulled over on the highway, observing a similar object. she did not pull over but observed the object for 20 minutes while driving.

on a different day around 9pm, witness and two friends were driving south on main street towards a water tower. behind the water tower was a dump site. saw an orange sphere falling from the sky slowly. they stopped and got out of the vehicle and saw the sphere hit the earth at the dump site. the sphere exploded and plasma flames shot up in the air. there was no sound and no earth vibrations. estimate size was 1000 feet in diameter. withing 15 seconds of the explosion, witness observed a ford country station wagon driving out of the dump site. the dome light was on in the station wagon and witness could see a man, woman, and two children. witness felt the the station wagon came out of the sphere because the people inside did not react to the object explosion. the station wagon drove off in the desert. witnesses were scared and did not approach the impact site and did not call the authorities.
content.summary: Large sun like object descended, hit the ground and exploded

content.detailedDescription: Witness was interviewed by phone and recounts the following: in the summer or fall of 1965, while living in deming, new mexico (where he was born), at the age of seven, he was playing football on the street with around 12 of his friends between 7-8pm, when a translucent sphere with a red light  came down to shoulder or hip level, then went down the  street where it made a right hand turn. the boys were puzzled and discussed whether it was a motorcycle, due to the red light which they interpreted as a tail light. they then looked up and hovering about a block away above city hall was a saucer shaped craft about 1000 feet across, 500-600 feet in altitude. the saucer had red, green and yellow lights and above the lights was a row of long rectangle windows. the saucer was a grey metallic color, had a flat bottom and a domed top. it hovered fo 2-5 minutes and the took off in a southernly direction, crusing away between 300-600 miles per hour towards palomas, new mexico. no sound was heard from the sphere or saucer. he likened his experience to the movie "close encounters of the third kind". all the kids were awe struck and did not discuss it amongst themselves or with their parents. age of witnesses ranged from 7 - 10 years old. he called the large saucer the mothership even though he did not observe the translucent sphere originate from or return to the saucer.
content.summary: First saw a translucent sphere, then the mothership

content.detailedDescription: I was aproximately 9 years old at the time.  i'm 51 today.  i was living below peavine mt. at a place called anderson acres.  it was the middle of summer, and it was a hot, clear day.  there were no clouds in the sky.  as i was playing in the side yard, where i lived, i looked across the highway, towards what is now redrock, and i saw a white, luminous, disc shaped saucer flying very slow along some small mts.  it caught my attention because it looked like a light bulb glowing.  i remember thinking to myself that it wasn't making any noise, so i knew it was not a helicopter.  it was also flying so slow that it couldn't have been a plane.  the shape wasn't like any flying shapes that i had ever seen either.  i continued to watch this disc fly very slow along the ridge of the mts.  as i watched, i thought to myself, "it's going to go behind that big hill next to the highway, then i will get a real good look at it when it comes out on the other side of the hill."  as i watched this saucer disappear behind the hill, i watched intently, waiting for it to come out on the other side of the hill.  as i watched it disappear, i looked at the other side of the hill, and all of a sudden, i saw a huge silver flash streak across the sky.  the saucer must have taken off, because i never saw anything come out the other side of the hill, except that flash.  i have seen 8 ufo's since that time, all in the last 10 years, since moving back to sparks, nevada in 1995...
content.summary: I saw a ufo near redrock below peavine mt. when i was a young boy.

content.detailedDescription: it was 4:45 p.M. when i pulled up to the intersection of fisher road and trabue.  i was hurrying home from work to take a sick cat to the vets.  while i waited for the light to change, i looked up, and saw a grayish missile elongated shaped object, about the size of a goodyear balloon.  at first, thats' what i thought i was seeing.  there was no sound, and it was about 150-200 ft in the air.  it had strange looking pinkish sails or protrusions sticking up all over it at odd angles.  it seemed to be drifting along as though watching the traffic below.  i don't know if anyone else noticed it.  it had one single white light blinking on and off at the tail end.  suddenly, it made a right-turn away from me, and speeded up in the opposite direction.  the light for me was green and i had to turn left to go home.  it happened so fast, i couldn't grab my camera, buried under junk in my purse.  by the time i had turned, i couldn't see the object anywhere in sight.  i scanned what sky i could see, and there was nothing.  that was no goodyear balloon.  thankyou
content.summary: Gray missile-shaped object with sails or projections on it with one single white blinking light at tail end

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from work at about 6 p.M.,  i work as the manager of a local resturant, i suddenly felt strange, as if something wasnt quite right. i saw a series of flashes followed by a disc shaped object flying inwards towards a field i was walking past.At first, i thought the days work had gotten to me, but then, i wasnt quite sure. there was very little sound and i could feel a lot of heat washing down from it. it landed in the field and went very silent. a large flash of light came from it and by then i was very frightened. i saw things moving around inside of it, another flash, and darkness. i awoke on the ground later, and tried to hitch-hike home to get home faster, and noticed i was closer to home than before. i panicked and ran home. i saw another flash above me. i looked up as i ran, and saw the craft hover, than dash off into space. i talked to my wife, and she was quite worried. i had been 6 hours late getting home. i now have a shoop shaped scar on my thigh and a jagged scar on my chest.
content.summary: Bright, color-changing, fast, terrifying, inhabited.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting on our patio at about 11:00 pm on 18 nov 06 watching the skies for leonid meteors.  i was looking nearly straight up when i saw an object entering my field of view from the north.  my first impression was that it looked like a parafoil, but a second later, it was clear that it was something else entirely and very strange.  it was shaped like a deeply-bowed crescent with pointed tips, dimly illuminated by city lights, not obviously metallic, not glowing or showing lights.  i called it to my wife's attention and she saw it as it passed almost directly overhead going south.  there was no sound.  the heading remained constant and in just a few seconds, it was lost in the darkness.  it crossed approximately 45 degrees in about five to ten seconds.  there was no way of determining its size or distance, but we both had the impression that it was relatively low, small, and fast. it did not seem to be a flock of birds or a single bird.  the shape was constant...No fluttering or wavering.  it seemed like an artificial object.  it certainly didn't look like any aircraft i am aware of and i'm an aviation enthusiast.
content.summary: Crescent-shaped object seen

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday, november 18, 2006
10:20 pm

i was heading home from work tonight on i96 west bound when about a ��� mile before my exit i noticed the vehicles ahead of me (two cars, and a semi tractor trailer) were putting on their brakes. i immediately thought ���oh great, an accident��� i was tired and wanted to get home. it was then, out of the corner of my eye that i seen very bright lights out my drivers window.  these lights were tree top height and were i���d guess about 50 yards away. i quickly took my foot off the gas and slowed way down while looking at these lights. there was a very large bright white light at each corner, 3, and in the middle, on the underside was another very bright white light. the lights were in the shape of a triangle. after a moment i quickly pulled over to the shoulder, rolled down my window and was reaching for my camera which was in my purse on the passenger seat while at the same time keeping my eyes on these lights which continued to move east. as i am struggling to get my camera it was moving further away. i could then see four to five, long slender, tube like red lights at the back end of it in between the two bright white lights and behind the center white light which was underneath. now, at this point i had to take my eyes away because my camera strap got hung up on the center council. by the time i got it loose and looked back i couldn���t see it. i then noticed heavy traffic was coming up behind me so i got back onto the highway and drove up to my exit. just as i got onto the off ramp, i looked into my rear view mirror and seen it again. when i got to the light at the end of the off ramp i turned left, drove down to grandriver, then turned left again to follow the lights, only now i couldn���t see them. i am now heading east (back-tracking) towards flying j���s gas station on grand river (two-lane county road) just opposite i96. i am also now on the phone with a friend of mine, telling her what i seen. as i am talking with her i spotted the lights again through the trees just before granger landfill. by the time i got up to the clearing where this thing should have been, it was gone. i searched the entire sky for it as i drove past flying j���s and pulled into an empty parking lot at an automotive engine shop. i sat there for a minute looking for it, and then got nervous since i was alone, and headed home. the rest of the way home i searched the sky���s for it but seen nothing���it was gone. my friend told me to call 911 and report it, but i didn���t want to tie up an emergency line, and i think that is illegal anyway if it���s not an emergency so first thing tomorrow morning i am calling the county sheriff.
content.summary: Bright white lights in sky at treetop height

content.detailedDescription:
I decided to take my 4.5 inch telescope out to view the orion nebula and to study betelgeuse and rigel. while searching for rigel, i stopped to look at some faint stars that you can't see with the naked eye.
i then noticed that one of them started to move. i thought it was an asteroid or maybe one of the meteors that was supposed to be in the meteor shower around 2 am. this object would speed up then nearly stop.It looked like a disc it didn't shine like a star would. it was too small to tell if it was a vehicle of some sort. 
the speed would change and direction would change. i followed the object for 15 minutes before losing it in the light pollution.
content.summary: Small disc, seen through a telescope, ability to change speed

content.detailedDescription: Looking up @ sky to see meteor shower. saw no meteors, not yet anyway. see approximately 10 pulsating lights that are much closer than a star would appear. my neighbor who called to tell me about the meteor shower came outside and observed it with me @ our fence. sighting located in all directions. look much like what i saw in college in fall of 1973 @ unc-chapel hill. students @ duke saw them also. except those had erratic movements so fast you could not really follow the path until they were beside each other at times. these are not doing that but do display some movement. same redish pulsating color with minimal left-right horizontal movement.
content.summary: Pulsating light with slight horizontal movement with pulsating redish tinge-located about 10-look like what i was in 1973 @ unc-chapel hill (fall)
content.locationName: Cary/Apex City limits sou, North Carolina

content.detailedDescription: On the exact date and exact time, according to my wrist watch when i looked down.  i was looking up at the constellation orion while outside.  suddenly, an orange streak of light raced across, just below orion's belt, as if you took a flash light and flashed it real quick.  this was a clear night, so you could very well make out most of the constellations.  the light ran a direct, straight path; my first reaction was possibly a shooting star (metorite entering earth's atmosphere) and may have been what it was.  however, i couldn't dismiss it as this, as it was a bright orangish color, from my distance at a measurement of 2-3 feet in length and was following too straight a path.  it is possible that it may be a shooting star, but i do want you to know that the direction it headed (on a south to north pattern), looked as if it were moving in a direction away from earth.  i know it sounds strange, but i have seen numerous "shooting stars" and this resembled nothing like a shooting star.  it was like it went from a dime size to pin size streak across the sky and was gone.  but again, i could not identify it as anything in particular, but thought you should know.  i hope that you might have some information for me on this occurrence, if as to what i noticed or if anyone else has noticed the same thing.  thanks.
content.summary: Like a shooting star

content.detailedDescription:
My initial impression was that there was something standing behind those two trees.  did you get to the dental appt. on time?

 when you posted later that you couldn't see the two figures i was a bit puzzled. two tan colored creatures plainly hiding behind the two trees in your front yard. the one on the right has a glowing right hand. makes me wonder about right v.S. left handedness in their species. at the time you took that blurry photo the glowing hand is extended in your direction and stopped glowing. the entity on the left is harder to see in your first photo. by adding sharpness three times the outline of a head, shoulder and arm became visible in your blurry photo.

i used irfanview to save the mspaint files as jpeg format.
sorry i didn't outline them for you earlier.

with regards to jc's comment:
in my experience the only people who truly fear having their photos taken are criminals.
content.summary: Apologies to pat donahue in mi.  i saw the two entities in your photos.
A large oval craft (150' x 30') impacted the desert and was subsequently buried in situ.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been an amateur astronomer on and off for over 3 decades. i have spent hundreds of hours gazing at the sky with telescopes, binoculars and the naked eye. i have observed venus, mars, jupiter and saturn, solar and lunar eclipses, comets, meteors, variable stars, the aurora borealis, nebulae and more. i am also familiar with the local air traffic and have tracked artificial satellites from horizon to horizon. i have never seen anything like what i witnessed in june, 2006.

sometime near in june 2006, i was observing jupiter using my meade etx-90ec astro telescope (approximately 3 ��� inch primary mirror) with a 26mm plossl eyepiece which yields a power of 48x.

i live in the western suburbs of cleveland, ohio, so the sky is never really great for viewing. but relatively speaking it was a good viewing night. it was a warm, clear night. i was observing jupiter and its four satellites, attempting to view some detail in the bands of jupiter. i could just make out three distinct bands on the planet. the 4 visible satellites were all lined-up almost horizontally (which is typical).

after about 10 minutes, i observed an object enter the field of view from about the 10 or 11 o���clock position. it was white and roughly the same brightness as the moons of jupiter, which means that it would not have been visible with the naked eye. it was moving in a straight line fairly quickly, traversing the distance from the edge of my view to where it stopped in about one second. it came to rest about 25% to 30% from the center of my view. it remained there for about two seconds then proceeded to move away off the right edge of my view in a shallow but definite arched curve. this second movement probably took a little less than one second.

when i first saw the object during its initial appearance, i immediately thought that i had happened upon an artificial satellite (in earth orbit) or perhaps a meteor. this would have been quite unusual given the limited field of view, but not unprecedented. one second later when it stopped i knew what i was seeing was quite unusual. when it moved off to the right in an arc i knew i was seeing something very strange.

the entire event took about four seconds. 

this is my first report. i wish that i had documented the sighting earlier. now i don���t remember the exact date or time.
content.summary: Anomalous object seen while viewing jupiter through telescope

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo looked like the nasa photo of m-104, except that the light in the center was a pin point and the main ball fit intierly within the inside of the ring, and the ring was flat and smoth. the main ball had very loarge holes in it. the holes were a mirror imagage to the spots on the sun at the time. the size of the holes and the sun spots got bigger as the ufo moved closer to the sun and smaller as it moved away from the sun. the surface of the main ball looked like a thin tatered rag. it had a rainbow on it. 

the ufo left a trail of heat behind it that lasted for a long time. it was about the size of a gulf ball when it first came up, it got smaller as it went around the sun and bigger as it came down again, to the size of a beach ball (bigger than a basket ball). as it moved around the sun it tilted so the same side always faced the direction of movement. 

i was a 5 year old child alone in my back yard facing north, when i felt something very hot on my back. i turned around and saw the ufo behind me, it did not seem to be moving so i turnd back around and noticed that the ground was sparkling and beeping. then the heat had increased, it felt like a hot pipe near my back. i looked again and the ufo had moved up and to the east. it passed under the sun and went up on the west side and over the top then down to the west at about a 30 degree angle and went down west of were it had come up.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Made hair pin turn around sun

content.detailedDescription: I was walking around my friend's neighborhood with her. everyone (except for us and a couple other nighthawks) had gone inside and it was quiet. i was aimlessly searching the skies, and my eyes fell upon an area between the roof of a house across the street and a tree in its front yard. a green sphere flew up between the house and tree, moved left about 10 feet(which looked like a couple centimeters from where i was standing) and descended.  i wear glasses, and my first thought was that the light was a reflection from my eyes onto the lenses of the glasses, but my friend (who wasn't wearing glasses) said she saw the same thing i did.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A green light appears in a residential area, moves over, descends
